dct_title_s: Le pays de Perou et Chili selon les observations nouvelles
dct_description_sm: "Tob. Conr. Lotter sculpsit." Map of the continent of South America, with part of Central America; relief shown pictorially. Date of publication supplied from Phillips, Vol. I, no. 2767. Ornate cartouche includes scenes of South American natives, flora, and fauna with European ships in background. Shows routes of explorers.
